data.lines:
This section is used in case you turned on in General Settings approve of loaded photos or video files. While choosing a category of loaded files, the table shows files that were not approved yet. Here you can
  • View a file clicking it;
  • View what this file is related to, clicking "View" (new window will open);
  • Approve a file or forbid it, putting a mark in the corresponding field.
If you don't forbid the file, member - the owner of the file - will see a corresponding message while managing his listing settings. This will prompt the user not to upload such files anymore. Other site members while previewing the listing will see only approved files.
There are no files awaiting approval
